website_summaries.verdict: A bright lantern-style chandelier best suited to smaller spaces.
pros: No glass cuts down on cleaning
cons: Some have complained that the bulb tines arrived bent

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 of these lanterns over the years (2 in my old house, 2 in my new house), and LOVE them. They are well made, easy to install, easy to clean (no glass!), and I get compliments all the time on them. I have 2 installed over my kitchen island. These are also for sale at Home Depot, but are more expensive there than on Amazon. I absolutely recommend buying this lantern...but don't just buy one! They look awesome in multiples!
customer_reviews.author: MommyMcKinn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but installation problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of this chandelier. We put it in our dining room. However, instructions were hard to understand. We had to take the light down after we connected all the electrical because we didn't have a part on correctly that holds the decorative cover on. Had the instructions told us how to do it, we would've been fine. The other thing I'm disappointed about is the middle candelabra piece is bent, making the entire center piece look off. I'll continue to work on straightening it out, but it may go back if it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Kane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture. The house we just bought had a recessed can light really close to the window in a two story foyer that connected to a a two story dining area. We decided to dress it up a little, and get a chandelier. I didn't want something too big and this was perfect. It gave my foyer some class. This looks much more expensive than what it was! I recommend putting in LED lightbulbs so they last longer. It's the perfect amount light for the area.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: Updates our 2-story entryway with a contemporary look
customer_reviews.text: We really love this light fixture. We had this professionally installed in our 2-story foyer to replace an old builder-grade shiny bronze and glass fixture. It is a striking look in our entryway. I love that it doesn't have glass to clean--the old fixture was forever getting dusty and filmy, and being so high up was a challenge to clean. This fixture has a classic shape, yet the black color and details lend an industrial/contemporary vibe. Very pleased with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixture, but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty light fixture- I wish it would have worked in my space, but it wasn't quite large enough. (I should have measured instead of eyeballing my old light!). I'd have to say the quality and price were good and it looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Foyer Light
customer_reviews.text: We searched extensively in lighting stores and in lighting sections of Lowes & HD not finding the right fixture. Then, searched Amazon where, once we spotted this Piedmont Foyer Lantern knew the style was right. We were purchasing to replace a larger, more elaborate bright brass fixture with a lot of glass content and debated if the size would be correct for the space. Fixture arrived packaged for easy removal. No assmbly except threading in the 4 bulbs ( not included & stated so on Amazon info ). Once hung, the fixture size seems pefect for the 6' X 8' two-story foyer space. The fixture is well constructed and finished. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hikker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality with rich color
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, quality with rich color. Lights up my hall well. My only complaint is the same as other posters mentioned; the tines which house the bulbs are bent slightly at an inward angle. I put a little elbow grease into each, being certain not to go too far and voila! Not even noticeable once hung. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Pail

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Good lighting quality, look and size for our two story foyer. Knocks:1)Supports for sockets are not curved correctly and the lights all lean in a bit. 2) Came with only 7' of chain, needed 9'. (did come with ample wire) Fortunately' I had some left from a dining room light in the same finish, though, you can get add'l chain at Home Depot, etc. Really a good looking light!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: In love with this beauty! The finish is nice and is a bit distressed with bronze accents. As other reviews mention the light sockets are a bit bent but it's not too noticeable. I purchased it when it was out of stock and was surprised to see it was delivered a week and a half later. Thank you Amazon!!! Would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Not our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but the finish is a little darker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Couple

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, well made fixture
customer_reviews.text: beautiful looking fixture. It is a slight updated version of the older fixtures because it doesnt have any glass panels which gives it a cool rustic look. seems very well made is is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Candelabra portion of light is crooked and we returned the first light for the same reason (only it was worse). Good price, disappointed with the quality. We kept the second one-but I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Although there are only 4 candelabra based bulbs the fixture has great, even light output
customer_reviews.text: This light is absolutely stunning. I purchased it for my foyer and it's simple design fits right in. Although there are only 4 candelabra based bulbs the fixture has great, even light output. The frame is sturdy and heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Clysia R. McFall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Just what I was looking for. There is no glass in these, which will be much easier to keep clean. I ordered two to be used in our long, narrow foyer. Can hardly wait to have them installed.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, high quality fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and heavy fixture. Perfect for our modern coastal home. Excited to get it hung. It's not large enough for a 2 story foyer if that's what you had in mind. Perfect for single story foyer, dining room or large master bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this light in my foyer, and I love it. I particularly liked it because it has no glass, which makes it very easy to dust and change light bulbs without hurting the appearance of the light. Would recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light and of great quality. It looks just lovely above my dining room table!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dube

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Looks great in the Foyer. Awesome quality. Very heavy and well made. Simple but classy with a contemporary flair. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: 4 light Piedmont Foyer Light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, Elegant , Classy - Looks Perfect Phenomenal in my foyer❗️❗️❗️👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👌🏾👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: J. Y. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Product is as described on website and adds ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Product is as described on website and adds a great touch to a farmhouse vintage kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights. Great value for great looking lights!
customer_reviews.author: SLI-1782

customer_reviews.title: Super light at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made, gorgeous light and a very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say about this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, and it makes my life easier. I actually dont mind replacing the bulbs no glass to fumble around with and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: gloy

customer_reviews.title: looks very nice. Plenty of length on chain
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice. Plenty of length on chain. Works with led bulbs
customer_reviews.author: M. Troup

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I especially appreciate that there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for the dining room and one for the entry. I love them. I especially appreciate that there is no glass to clean :)
customer_reviews.author: ronda h

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this light. It looks amazing in my entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Botis

customer_reviews.title: Item is great looking and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is great looking and high quality. The pictures online make it seem more black in color. This is more on the bronze side.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Enyedi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light/great value!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a lot and Amazon had the best price. This light is a very pretty fixture; a nice solid piece. It changed the whole look of my dining space. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality. Put cool Edison vintage bulbs in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Put cool Edison vintage bulbs in it and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived missing parts and bent. Would not recommend buying this fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks so nice over my kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: We love this light
customer_reviews.text: We love this light! We have a split foyer which means we have like a two story wall you see from our living room and I've hated it as long as we've lived in our house. I hadn't been able to find something that wouldn't look super awkward because of how large the wall is and this is perfect. My only regret is not finding this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Larger than I thought it would be.Easy to install. It looks beautiful over my breakfast table in the kitchen! Looks like it was purchased at a higher end store.
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Bent
customer_reviews.text: Bent when arrived. Attempted to bend back but still just not quite right and I can see it every time I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Eam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It is well made and I do not have to dust any glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this light--it was exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful!!! I ordered three of them for my hallway and could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Miller

customer_reviews.title: looks good in a foyer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lantern for our foyer. It has a nice combination of old world & new world, so I'm pretty happy with it. It isn't very heavy, so installation was pretty straight forward like any other lighting fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamp. Heavier than it looks and solidly built. Great value. Watch the dimensions. The dimensions given are the diagonal of the square frame at the largest point. The actual base measures 9 x 9 inches so it was smaller than I expected. I hung it so you view it as the widest dimension and it worked out well for the space.
customer_reviews.author: Recorder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture for the entryway in our new home. I took a risk and bought a 'like new' condition option available in Amazon Warehouse to save a few bucks and have no complaints. Was not in original packaging, but no defects and packaged well otherwise with all the parts and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: greenmom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and substantial-better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and they are perfect! Actually using 2 of them in my kitchen and replacing crappy big box lighting. Can't wait to put them up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great size for medium to large space, well made, looks expensive, easy assembly and cleaning. Wonderful update for my foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Progress Lighting Foyer Light
customer_reviews.text: We bought our current house last summer. It came with a beautiful hanging light (15') that was uncleanable on the inside and with bulbs that required a lowering of the light to remove. This glassless and beautiful fixture has neither of those problems and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Didit

customer_reviews.title: Front foyer light
customer_reviews.text: We added this new light fixture to our front foyer it gave it a unique look. We are enjoying the light can't wait to show it off to our friends and family. Was easy to install and liked there was extra chain so we could pick our desired length to hang from the ceiling Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bill krueger

customer_reviews.title: Nice foyer light
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this light. It was much cheaper than many of the other lights I considered, provides plenty of light with 4 60W bulbs, and came fully assembled so it was pretty easy to install. When the light arrived, it was missing the chain and the ceiling attachment kit. However, Amazon Customer Service was great, and they overnighted to me a new one that had all the parts and gave me a UPS label to ship back the incomplete light. So, I am pleased with both the light and the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lebowski

product_meta.title: Progress Lighting Piedmont Collection Four-Light Cage Entry Light, Antique Bronze
product_meta.description:
Color:BronzeFour-light foyer lantern with soaring arches and candle chaser accents. Simple vertical structure with open arching roof and center inspired by classic shaker design. Antique Bronze finish.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Simple and vertical in form, Piedmont features an open arching roof and center truss inspired by classic Shaker design. Designed to be used singly in a foyer or in series over a dining table, kitchen island or as a wall bracket when installed on the P8762 accessory arm (sold separately). 4-Light foyer lantern with soaring arches and candle chaser accents. Simple vertical structure with open arching roof and center inspired by classic shaker design. Uses (4) 60-Watt candelabra bulbs 13-3/8-Inch Width by 20-3/8-Inch Height
feature_bullets: SHAKER INSPIRED DESIGN: lantern-style metal frames create an airy structure ideal for emitting ambient light over memories being made below. Inside the frame perch smooth, simple light bases ready to offer your home a lovely glow.
MULTIPLE LOCATIONS: Ideal for a hallway, foyer, entryway, kitchen, or dining room. Perfect for transitional, new traditional, and farmhouse settings.
ANTIQUE BRONZE FINISH: A beautiful antique bronze finish coats the lantern-style frame for an eye-pleasing, handsome design.
SIZE: 20-3/8-inch height, and 13-3/8-inch width. Max Height - 95.00 inch

BULB TYPE: inside the frame perch smooth, simple light bases ready to offer your home a lovely glow. Uses four candelabra base bulbs that are sold separately (60w max - LED, halogen, or incandescent).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
